com.geom.database

Class FigureDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geom.database.DAO<Figure>
      • com.geom.database.FigureDAO

  • public class FigureDAO
extends DAO<Figure>
    This class implements the specific layer to access to interact with 'Figure' table in the database A 'Figure' is here french for geometric shapes. It is formed by points, and lengths (or segments). To define a 'Figure' in the database you basically needs :
    • ID : The specific id of a figure
    • Type : The type of a Figure e.g triangle, rectangular, square,...
    • Perimetre : perimeter
    • Surface : The surface area of the geometric figure
    Author:
    Dasha
